He took it upon himself to reach a conclusion on obstruction.

My advice: Wait to read Mueller’s words for yourself.

html: My #SOTU guest, Chante, told me: “Taxpayers count on their refund check year after year to pay bills, pay for college & make big purchases they couldn't ordinarily afford. We still are unsure when taxpayers can expect to receive refunds.” We must prevent another #TrumpShutdown.
text:
My #SOTU guest, Chante, told me: “Taxpayers count on their refund check year after year to pay bills, pay for college & make big purchases they couldn't ordinarily afford. We still are unsure when taxpayers can expect to receive refunds.” 

We must prevent another #TrumpShutdown.

html: Fewer #IRS employees impacts taxpayers & tax professionals preparing for the 2019 filing season, resulting in delayed returns, difficulty obtaining loans, paused audits/exams, & unanswered questions for families. That's why I intro'd leg to reopen the IRS during #TrumpShutdown.

html: Did you know this week marks the 200th anniversary of our great state? It is a privilege to represent #Illinois and the City of #Chicago in Congress, and I'm convinced that there is no greater place to start a family, build a business, or simply visit just for fun.
text:
Did you know this week marks the 200th anniversary of our great state?

It is a privilege to represent #Illinois and the City of #Chicago in Congress, and I'm convinced that there is no greater place to start a family, build a business, or simply visit just for fun.
